com.fasterxml.util.membuf.SegmentAllocator

  • Packages that use SegmentAllocator 
    Package Description
    com.fasterxml.util.membuf
    Package that contains public API of the the library.
    com.fasterxml.util.membuf.base
    Intermediate typed base classes that offer partial implementations of API types and/or refinements, but do not fully implement them.
    com.fasterxml.util.membuf.impl
    Package that contains implementations of the API classes.

      class  SegmentAllocatorBase<S extends Segment<S>>
